itemDescription: English Police and Crime Commissioner for Hertfordshire

wikipedia_page.main: David Lloyd is a British Conservative Party politician and financial adviser. Since 2012, he has been the Hertfordshire Police and Crime Commissioner for Hertfordshire Constabulary. He was a member of Milton Keynes Council in the 1990s and was a member of Hertfordshire County Council from 2001 to 2017.
